name: Warty and Weevil
description:
Play as Warty and Weevil as you help Weevil climb to the skies! Place Warty's magic blocks wise and build a strong structure for Weevil. Use your Leaf-Power to solidify blocks for strategic building!

Made for the Brackey's Game Jam 2021.1 with the theme: 'Stronger together'.

Controls:

WASD: Control Weevil

Arrow Keys: Control Warty's blocks and make them fall faster

Space: Jump / Propellor (You have to find it first!) / Skip Cutscene

E: Solidify a block

R: Respawn

Reach 50 meters for a special, but harder block!

Thanks for playing!

Made by RunninBlood & Wastyr
